description.english: Escaped the dungeons and reached Set Maat, The Place of Truth
description.spanish: Escapaste de las mazmorras y llegaste a Set Maat, El Lugar de la Verdad
description.polish: Ucieknij z lochów i dotrzyj do Set Maatu, Miejsca Prawdy
description.german: Entkam den Kerkern und erreichte Set Maat, den Platz der Wahrheit.
description.french: Enfui des donjons et atteint Set Maât, la Place de vérité
description.italian: Sei fuggito dai sotterranei e hai raggiunto Set Maat, il luogo della verità

description.english: Entered the Valley of Kings, formerly sacred Burial Grounds
description.spanish: Entraste al Valle de los Reyes, antiguamente Cámaras de Sacrificio sagradas
description.polish: Wejdź do Doliny Królów, dawnego świętego miejsca pochówku
description.german: Betrat das Tal der Könige, wo sich früher heilige Grabstätten befanden.
description.french: Entré dans la Vallée des rois, jadis Cimetière sacré
description.italian: Sei entrato nella valle dei Re, che in precedenza era un cimitero consacrato

description.english: Found the Oasis of Shedet, source of Life-Water
description.spanish: Encontraste el Oasis de Shedet, fuente de Agua de Vida
description.polish: Odnajdź oazę Szedet, źródło Wody Życia
description.german: Fand die Oase von Shedet, die lebensspendendes Wasser bietet.
description.french: Trouvé l'oasis de Shedet, source de l'Eau de vie
description.italian: Hai trovato l'oasi di Shedet, fonte di acqua e di vita

description.english: Got past the Oasis and reached the Royal Quarry
description.spanish: Avanzaste más allá del Oasis y alcanzaste la Cantera Real
description.polish: Przejdź przez oazę i dotrzyj do Królewskiego Kamieniołomu
description.german: Brachte die Oase hinter sich und erreichte den Königlichen Steinbruch.
description.french: Franchi l'oasis et atteint la Carrière royale
description.italian: Hai superato l'oasi e raggiunto la cava reale

description.english: Got to the Halls of Stone, where stone abominations roam free
description.spanish: Llegaste a los Salones de Piedra, donde abominaciones pétreas vagan libres
description.polish: Dotrzyj do Kamiennych Sal, w których kamienne wynaturzenia włóczą się na wolności
description.german: Kam zu den Steinernen Hallen, wo steinerne Unwesen frei herumziehen.
description.french: Arrivé aux Salles de pierre, où les abominations rocheuses errent en liberté
description.italian: Hai raggiunto le sale di pietra, in cui degli abominii di pietra vagano in libertà

description.english: Arrived at the Nile Delta, a rich and fertile region
description.spanish: Llegaste al Delta del Nilo, una región rica y fértil
description.polish: Dotrzyj do delty Nilu, bogatego i żyznego rejonu
description.german: Kam im Nildelta an, einer reichen, fruchtbaren Region.
description.french: Arrivé au delta du Nil, une région riche et fertile
description.italian: Sei arrivato al delta del Nilo, una regione ricca e fertile

description.english: Traversed the Nile Delta and got to Avaris
description.spanish: Atravesaste el Delta del Nilo y llegaste a Avaris
description.polish: Przekrocz deltę Nilu i dotrzyj do Awaris
description.german: Überquerte das Nildelta und kam nach Avaris.
description.french: Traversé le delta du Nil et arrivé à Avaris
description.italian: Hai attraversato il delta del Nilo e sei giunto ad Avaris

description.english: Found the 4 keys and entered the Great City of Thebes
description.spanish: Encontraste las 4 llaves y entraste en la Gran Ciudad de Tebas
description.polish: Odnajdź 4 klucze i wejdź do Wielkiego Miasta Teb
description.german: Fand die 4 Schlüssel und betrat die Große Stadt Theben.
description.french: Trouvé les 4 clés et entré dans la grande cité de Thèbes
description.italian: Hai trovato 4 chiavi e sei entrato nella grande città di Tebe

description.english: Managed to make your way to the palace
description.spanish: Conseguiste llegar al palacio
description.german: Drang mit Erfolg zum Palast vor.
description.french: Réussi à vous frayer un chemin jusqu'au palais
description.italian: Sei riuscito a farti strada fino al palazzo

description.english: Killed The Warden, Tyrant of the sacrificial dungeons
description.spanish: Derrotaste al Alguacil, tirano de las mazmorras sacrificiales
description.german: Tötete den Wächter, den Tyrannen der Kerker für die Opferdarbringung.
description.french: Tué le Gardien, tyran des donjons sacrificiels
description.italian: Hai ucciso il Guardiano, tiranno dei sotterranei sacrificali

displayName.german: Senen, den Kapitän von Set Maat

description.english: Killed Senen, Captain of Set Maat
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Senen, Capitán de Set Maat
description.german: Tötete Senen, den Kapitän von Set Maat.
description.french: Tué Senen, capitaine de Set Maât
description.italian: Hai ucciso Senen, capitano di Set Maat

description.english: Killed Senakhtenre, forgotten Pharaoh
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Senakhtenre, el Faraón olvidado
description.german: Tötete Senakhtenre, den vergessenen Pharao.
description.french: Tué Sénakhtenrê, pharaon oublié
description.italian: Hai ucciso Senakhtenre, faraone dimenticato

description.english: Killed Theseus, Wanax of Mycenae
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Teseo, Anax de Micenas
description.german: Tötete Theseus, Anax von Mykene.
description.french: Tué Thésée, anax de Mycènes
description.italian: Hai ucciso Theseus, wanax di Micene

description.english: Killed Queen Circe, Overlady of Aeaea
description.spanish: Derrotaste a la Reina Circe, Gobernante de Eea
description.german: Tötete Königin Circe, Herrin von Aeaea.
description.french: Tué la reine Circé, souveraine d'Ééa
description.italian: Hai ucciso la regina Circe, signora di Eea

description.english: Killed Penamun, corrupted stonemason
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Penamun, Maestro Cantero corrupto
description.german: Tötete Penamun, den korrupten Steinmetz.
description.french: Tué Penamon, tailleur de pierre corrompu
description.italian: Hai ucciso Penamun, un tagliapietre corrotto

description.english: Destroyed the War Golem
description.spanish: Derrotaste al Golem de Batalla
description.german: Zerstörte den Kriegsgolem.
description.french: Détruit le Golem de la guerre
description.italian: Hai distrutto il golem della guerra

description.english: Killed Iä and Qraqen
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Iä y Qraqen
description.german: Tötete Iä und Qraqen.
description.french: Tué Iä et Qraqen
description.italian: Hai ucciso Iä e Qraqen

description.english: Killed Oannes, Satrapess of Avaris
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Oanness, Sátrapa de Avaris
description.german: Tötete Oannes, den Statthalter von Avaris.
description.french: Tué Oannès, satrape d'Avaris
description.italian: Hai ucciso Oannes, satrapessa di Avaris

description.english: Destroyed the Atencraft shabti
description.spanish: Destruiste el Artefacto Atenista Shabti
description.german: Zerstörte das Atencraft-Uschebti.
description.french: Détruit l'ouchebti d'Aton
description.italian: Hai distrutto lo shabti Atencraft

description.english: Defeat the Warden with your torch
description.spanish: Derrota al Alguacil con tu antorcha
description.german: Besiege den Wächter mit deiner Fackel.
description.french: Vainquez le Gardien avec votre torche
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Guardiano con la tua torcia

description.english: Killed an enemy with the fishing rod
description.spanish: Mataste a un enemigo con la caña de pescar
description.german: Tötete einen Feind mit der Angelrute.
description.french: Tué un ennemi avec la canne à pêche
description.italian: Hai ucciso un nemico con una canna da pesca

description.english: Defeat a boss without getting hit
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe sin recibir ni un impacto
description.polish: Pokonaj bossa, nie otrzymując żadnego ciosu
description.german: Besiege einen Boss, ohne einen Schlag einzustecken.
description.french: Vainquez un boss sans vous faire toucher
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss senza essere colpito

description.english: Defeated a boss with almost no health left
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe a las puertas de la muerte
description.polish: Pokonaj bossa, nie mając prawie żadnych punktów życia
description.german: Besiegte einen Boss und kam dabei fast ums Leben.
description.french: Vaincu un boss avec pratiquement plus de santé
description.italian: Hai sconfitto un boss rimanendo quasi senza salute

description.english: Save 40000 silver kidets
description.spanish: Ahorra 40000 kidets de plata
description.german: Spare 40000 Silber-Qedets
description.french: Économisez 40 000 kidets d'argent
description.italian: Risparmia 40.000 kidet d'argento

description.english: Reach Level 5
description.spanish: Alcanza el Nivel 5
description.german: Erreiche Erfahrungslevel 5
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 5
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 5

description.english: Reach Level 10
description.spanish: Alcanza el Nivel 10
description.german: Erreiche Erfahrungslevel 10
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 10
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 10

description.english: Reach Level 20
description.spanish: Alcanza el Nivel 20
description.german: Erreiche Erfahrungslevel 20
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 20
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 20

description.english: Reach Level 30
description.spanish: Alcanza el Nivel 30
description.german: Erreiche Erfahrungslevel 30
description.french: Atteignez le niveau d'expérience 30
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello di esperienza 30

description.english: Kill an enemy with a trap
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con una trampa
description.german: Töte einen Feind mit einer Falle.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi avec un piège
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con una trappola

description.english: Found all the Heka Steles
description.spanish: Encontraste todas las Estelas de Heka
description.german: Fand alle Heka-Stelen.
description.french: Trouvé toutes les stèles de Héka
description.italian: Hai trovato tutte le Heka Steles

description.english: Died while trying to drink from your canteen
description.spanish: Moriste mientras intentabas beber de tu cantimplora
description.polish: Zgiń, próbując napić się z manierki
description.german: Starb beim Versuch, von deiner Feldflasche zu trinken.
description.french: Mort en tentant de boire le contenu de votre gourde
description.italian: Sei morto cercando di bere dalla tua borraccia

description.english: Died on a trap
description.spanish: Moriste en una trampa
description.german: Starb in einer Falle
description.french: Mort dans un piège
description.italian: Sei morto in una trappola

description.english: Get a Skill to the max level
description.spanish: Mejora una habilidad al máximo nivel
description.german: Entwickle eine Fähigkeit bis zum höchsten Niveau
description.french: Atteignez le niveau max dans une aptitude
description.italian: Massimizza il livello di un'abilità

description.english: Get Kheti out of his jail
description.spanish: Libera a Kheti de su jaula
description.german: Befreie Kheti aus seinem Gefängnis.
description.french: Faites sortir Khéti de sa prison
description.italian: Fai uscire Kheti di prigione

description.english: Bring Pratchnefer news about her daughter
description.spanish: Traele noticias a Pratchnefer sobre su hija
description.polish: Dostarcz Pratchnefer wiadomości o jej córce
description.german: Übermittle Pratchnefer Nachrichten über ihre Tochter.
description.french: Apportez des nouvelles de sa fille à Pratchnefer
description.italian: Fai avere a Pratchnefer notizie su sua figlia

description.english: Complete Sherybin's request
description.spanish: Completa la petición de Sherybin
description.german: Führe Sherybins Wunsch zu Ende.
description.french: Achevez la requête de Sherybin
description.italian: Completa la richiesta di Sherybin

description.english: Give the Merchant Goods to either Mentmose or Kafy
description.spanish: Dale las Mercancías a Mentmose o a Kafy
description.polish: Oddaj towary kupieckie Mentmose lub Kafy
description.german: Gib die Handelsgüter entwederMentmose oder Kafy.
description.french: Donnez les produits du marchand à Mentmose ou Kafy
description.italian: Dai le merci a Mentmose o a Kafy

description.english: Help a man in need in the Oasis
description.spanish: Ayuda a un necesitado en el Oasis
description.polish: Pomóż w oazie człowiekowi w potrzebie
description.german: Hilf einem Mann in Not in der Oase.
description.french: Aidez un homme dans le besoin dans l'oasis
description.italian: Aiuta un bisognoso nell'oasi

description.english: Give the family heirlooms back to her owner
description.spanish: Devuelve la herencia familiar a su dueña
description.german: Gib die Familienerbstücke dem Besitzer zurück.
description.french: Rendez l'héritage familial à sa propriétaire
description.italian: Restituisci i cimeli di famiglia alla legittima proprietaria

description.english: Recover the fisherwoman's fishing rod
description.spanish: Recupera la caña de la pescadora
description.german: Hole die Angelrute der Fischersfrau.
description.french: Retrouvez la canne à pêche de la pêcheuse
description.italian: Recupera la canna da pesca della pescatrice

description.english: Recover the Naval Commander's Command baton
description.spanish: Recupera el bastón de mando del Comandante Naval
description.german: Hole den Admiralstab des Flottenführers.
description.french: Retrouver le bâton de commandement du Commandant de navire
description.italian: Recupera il bastone del comando del comandante navale

description.english: Give the lotus-eater money for his addiction
description.spanish: Dale al Lotófago dinero para su addicción
description.polish: Daj uzależnionemu od lotosu pieniądze na nałóg
description.german: Gib dem Lotophagen Geld für seine Sucht.
description.french: Donnez de l'argent au mangeur de lotus pour son addiction
description.italian: Dai al mangiatore di loto dei soldi per la sua dipendenza

description.english: Bring Werenro her earrings
description.spanish: Dale los pendientes a Werenro
description.german: Bringe Werenro ihre Ohrringe.
description.french: Apportez ses boucles d'oreille à Werenro
description.italian: Fai avere a Werenro i suoi orecchini

displayName.german: Ein sicherer Weg in die Freiheit

description.english: Give Takharu a full Thebes soldier set
description.spanish: Dale a Takharu un set de soldado de Tebas completo
description.polish: Daj Takharu pełny zestaw tebańskiego żołnierza
description.german: Gib Takharu ein komplettes Theben-Soldatenset.
description.french: Donnez à Takharu un ensemble complet de soldat de Thèbes
description.italian: Dai a Takharu una serie completa di soldati di Tebe

description.english: Do a trade with the Catatonic Survivor in the Halls of Stone
description.spanish: Realiza un intercambio con el Superviviente Catatónico en las Cámaras de Piedra
description.polish: Dokonaj wymiany z ocalałym w Kamiennych Salach
description.german: Betreibe mit dem katatonischen Überlebenden Handel in den Steinernen Hallen.
description.french: Faites un échange avec le Survivant catatonique dans les Salles de pierre
description.italian: Fai uno scambio con il superstite catatonico nelle sale di pietra

description.english: Die for the first time
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez
description.german: Stirb zum ersten Mal.
description.french: Mourez pour la première fois
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta

description.english: Die 10 times
description.spanish: Muere 10 veces
description.german: Stirb 10 Mal
description.french: Mourez 10 fois
description.italian: Muori 10 volte

description.english: Die 25 times
description.spanish: Muere 25 veces
description.german: Stirb 25 Mal
description.french: Mourez 25 fois
description.italian: Muori 25 volte

description.english: Kill 25 enemies
description.spanish: Mata a 25 enemigos
description.german: Töte 25 Feinde
description.french: Tuez 25 ennemis
description.italian: Uccidi 25 nemici

description.english: Kill 50 enemies
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos
description.german: Töte 50 Feinde
description.french: Tuez 50 ennemis
description.italian: Uccidi 50 nemici

description.english: Kill 100 enemies
description.spanish: Mata a 100 enemigos
description.german: Töte 100 Feinde
description.french: Tuez 100 ennemis
description.italian: Uccidi 100 nemici

description.english: Perform 20 successful parries
description.spanish: Realiza 20 contragolpes con éxito
description.german: Führe 20 erfolgreiche Paraden aus.
description.french: Effectuez 20 parades réussies
description.italian: Esegui con successo 20 parate

description.english: Killed Ahmosis I, Master of the Two Lands
description.spanish: Derrotaste a Ahmosis I, Maestro de las Dos Tierras
description.polish: Zabij Ahmosisa I, Pana Dwóch Krain
description.german: Tötete Ahmosis I, den Meister der Zwei Länder
description.french: Tué Ahmôsis Ier, maître des Deux Terres
description.italian: Uccidi Ahmosis I, maestro delle Due Terre

description.english: Help Astarte become the new ruler of Egypt
description.spanish: Ayuda a Astarte a convertirse en la nueva gobernante de Egipto
description.polish: Pomóż Astarte zostać nowym władcą Egiptu
description.german: Hilf Astarte, der neue Herrscher Ägyptens zu werden.
description.french: Aidez Astarté à devenir la nouvelle souveraine d'Égypte
description.italian: Aiuta Astarte a diventare il nuovo sovrano d'Egitto

description.english: Become the new ruler of Egypt
description.spanish: Conviértete en el nuevo gobernante de Egipto
description.german: Werde der neue Herrscher Ägyptens.
description.french: Devenez le nouveau souverain d'Égypte
description.italian: Diventa il nuovo sovrano d'Egitto

description.english: You have brouhgt chaos upon the Two Lands
description.spanish: Has traido el Caos a las Dos Tierras
description.german: Du hast Chaos in die Zwei Länder gebracht.
description.french: Vous avez semé le chaos dans les Deux Terres
description.italian: Hai portato scompiglio nelle Due Terre
